Table of Contents

Name

badman - create reference to non-existing documentation

Synopsis

badman man_name man_level

Description

badman creates a reference to a non-existing man page using the roff include file (.so) command to $NEMO/man/man1/badman.1 manual page.

History

7-may-92    this man page created    PJT
